General.Name: Silver Bear Resources Inc
General.Description: Silver Bear Resources Plc engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of precious metal properties in the Russian Federation. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. Its principal asset is the Mangazeisky silver project located to the north of Yakutsk in the Republic of Sakha. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Regis House, London, United Kingdom, EC4R 9AN
